calculator.title: Calculator Settings
calculator.subtitle: Manage solar panel and battery specifications for the calculator
calculator.description: Manage solar panel and battery specifications used in the solar calculator. These values will be available for users to select when calculating their solar system requirements.
calculator.applianceSettingsDesc: Manage the appliances and their default wattages for the user calculator.
